location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch of the Ground in the Neighbourhood of AHWAZ ON THE KARUN. showing the position occupied by the PERSIAN ARMY, and the advance of the BRITISH DETACHMENT upon the Town, March 1857.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 213 x 127mm, on sheet 244 x 148mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a region around Ahwaz in south-western Persia, indicating the position occupied by the Persian army, and the landing place and advance of British troops. The map also indicates hydrology and buildings, with some indication of relief, and brief descriptions of topography.The map is Plate 5 in 'Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman' (Naval Intelligence Department No. 694), 1903, and is 'Reproduced from "Outrams Persian Campaign 1857"'.A printing statement reads, 'Weller & Graham, Ltd. Litho, London.'.
